ComicInfo.Title: Patrick Spring & the 7 Stages; Chapter 4: The Miseducation of Farah Black
ComicInfo.Series: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency: The Salmon of Doubt
ComicInfo.Summary:
Plagued by nightmares of a life he never had, Dirk Gently discovers that a holistic detective can have more than one past, and they're about to catch up with him! Featuring favorite characters from the original books as well as the cast from the TV series, including Samuel Barnett and Elijah Wood!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ilias Kyriazis | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Photo | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Robert Hack & Charlie Kirchoff | 3 | Note: The digital edition (1/11/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
